Woodcutting) -Perfect Custom Skillzones for Every Skill -Custom Minigames with Point Systems for Strong Armor -Lots of Different Rares that Stimulate the Economy -Boss System (Can Only Get to the Highest Boss by Killing the Lower Ones First) -No Glitches (Obviously) -More than Just a Cape for Reaching 99, Like Custom Weapons for Each Skill (More Ideas to Come......)

item.title: [562/HD] UnitedScape {Updated}
item.dc:creator: @Creede Creede
item.description:
@Creede wrote:

Name: Creed
Age: 15
MSN: creeddeed@hotmail.com
How long can you be on each day: 7-10 hrs without school aka weekends and 5 with school
Applying For: Web Developer/ Gfx designer
Experience: I have made forums for several servers, spirit-scape, eruptionx, jakejakescape, xfactor, project x, hydrafury(old one).
I use mybb(like vbulletin except free and i can get a single domain) been doing gfx for 2 years i use photoshop cs5 and i will post pictures of my work at the end of this app.
Some of your Ideas: well i want to give your server a modern look to it that when people join your forums they see a forums that is vibrant but subtle, and Your server is the next gen pretty much you don’t get al ot of HD ones and I want to combine my HD forums and HD graphics with your HD server to create a HD experience that will leave people in a orgasm endued coma

item.title: [562/HD] UnitedScape {Updated}
item.dc:creator: @Daniel8 Daniel™
item.description:
@Daniel8 wrote:

[quote=“Cowarooroo, post:1, topic:404468”][center]

Features:
-24/7 Dedicated VPS
-All Working Skills
-Varrock Base
-100% Summoning
-Mostly Working Hunter
-All Skills Working
-Compile Without Restart to Maximize Uptime
(not too many right now)

Goals:
-Custom Quests for Rares
-::players Will Show What Area Someone’s At (Cowarooroo - Level 138 … Woodcutting)
-Perfect Custom Skillzones for Every Skill
-Custom Minigames with Point Systems for Strong Armor
-Lots of Different Rares that Stimulate the Economy
-Boss System (Can Only Get to the Highest Boss by Killing the Lower Ones First)
-No Glitches (Obviously)
-More than Just a Cape for Reaching 99, Like Custom Weapons for Each Skill
(More Ideas to Come…)
